briefdescription.para: UUID of the Distance Measurement Characteristic.
UUID of the Azimuth Measurement Characteristic.
UUID of the Elevation Measurement Characteristic.
UUID of the Control Point Characteristic.
Function for sending Distance Measurement value.

detaileddescription.para: The application calls this function after having performed a Distance Measurement. If notification has been enabled, the measurement data is encoded and sent to the client.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to connection object, or NULL if sent to all connected peers.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a negative error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for sending Azimuth Measurement value.

detaileddescription.para: The application calls this function after having performed an Azimuth Measurement. If notification has been enabled, the measurement data is encoded and sent to the client.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to connection object, or NULL if sent to all connected peers.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a negative error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for sending Elevation Measurement value.

detaileddescription.para: The application calls this function after having performed an Elevation Measurement. If notification has been enabled, the measurement data is encoded and sent to the client.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to connection object, or NULL if sent to all connected peers.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a negative error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the Direction and Distance Finding Service.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a negative error code is returned.
